Description: Order number of the site according to the publication: D. M. Holiaka, S. E. Levchuk, M. O. Hrechaniuk, V. V. Illienko, M. A. Holiaka, V. P. Protsak, V. O. Kashparov (2026). Cs-137 release from combustible materials burning under different environmental conditions in the Chornobyl Exclusion Zone
Order number of sampling points at the site
Type  of landscape
Burning data for combustible material samples

Type of sample: GFF is green forest floor (moss or grass vegetation); L is fresh litterfall layer of forest litter; F is fragmented layer of forest litter; H is humified layer of forest litter; Litter is all layers of the soil organic horizon including live GFF; Live branch is green live branch of pine trees (shoots up to 1.0 cm in diameter)
Mass of combustible material under field conditions
Mass of combustible material after air-drying
Mass of residue after combustion of combustible material
Moisture content of the sample at the time of combustion
Ratio between the sample mass before and after combustion
Cs-137 activity concentration in combustible material under air-dry conditions; values marked with an asterisk (*) correspond to field conditions
Uncertainty of Cs-137 activity concentration in combustible material expressed as the mean error at 2 standard deviations (±2SD)
Cs-137 activity deposited on the Petryanov filter cloth during the fire experiment
Uncertainty of Cs-137 activity on Petryanov filter cloth  expressed as the mean error  in ±2SD
Cs-137 activity deposited on all other surfaces (excluding the filter cloth) of the field-scale combustion setup
Uncertainty of s-137 activity deposited on all other surfaces (excluding the filter cloth) of the field-scale combustion setup expressed as the mean error at ±2SD
Calculated total Cs-137 activity deposited on all surfaces of the field-scale combustion setup
Uncertainty of total Cs-137 activity deposited on all surfaces of the field-scale combustion setup expressed as the mean error at ±2SD
Calculated total Cs-137 activity in combustible material before combustion
Uncertainty of total Cs-137 activity in combustible material before combustion expressed as the mean error at ±2SD
Cs-137 release factor from combustible materials to atmospheric air
Uncertainty of calculated Cs-137 release factor expressed as the mean error at ±2SD
